name: Blite (yahya ali)
description:
Blite stands out in its idea and design from the rest of the 2D games. You have to skip the existing stages that formed from black and white and then face the monster that awaits you in the end and you will surely enjoy your adventure in a small square.

You just have to reach the eight stars using:

- Move and jumping with arrows

- Color Changing with space


Greetings from YAHAY GAMES.
